description: Ms. codex. Physical description: 19 lines per page; written in naskh (Arabic) and nastaʻliq (Persian) in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Rubrication and catchwords. First leaf detached. Damp staining across top of manuscript and some marginal paper repairs. Some loss of text on last leaf due paper loss and staining. Origin: Likely 18th century.
contents: 11. leaves 87a-101b: [Shukūk al-ṣalāh] / Muḥammad Bāqir ibn Muḥammad Taqī al-Majlisī.
extent: 101 leaves : paper ; 175 x 116 (150 x 88) mm bound to 184 x 121 mm
title: Mafātīḥ al-ghayb ... [etc.].
subject: Manuscripts, Persian—New Jersey—Princeton
binding note: Limp dark brown leather with blind-tooled fillets; spine repaired.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
